main.name: Zeyu Wang
main.bio: An ambitious and result-driven JavaScript/React Developer with Front-End Development experience and substantial success in using React, Redux, and Redux-Saga to build major functionalities. Uses the aglie methodology to develop robust solutions, optimizes code for stability and functionality and implements patterns to maximize code clarity, reuse and maintainability
